case.state: Hi, everyone! Who's ready to hop right in!
Ready for things to start heating up?
Hi, I'm May! Are you ready for a challenge?
It's actually New Year's Day in my world too! So Happy New Year to everyone!
That's not the kind of bunnysuit we were all supposed to wear, is it? What about for those of us with smaller... frames?
Aw, you didn't dress up, Misty? I was hopping we'd get to see you in an Azumarill outfit...

(Don't look at his bulge.
Don't look at his bulge.
Pretend everything is normal.)
How sweet! I love your frills, Emi!
Wow, you really went all out on the pink theme, didn't you?
So pretty! I love the flowers!
I think Catria needs some encouragement. Who else thinks she looks beautiful?
A belated Happy New Year to you too.
What is that thing?!
Misty, you're here too?! Oh this is going to be so fun with the two of us.
Wait a minute, why can you fly? Are you really a vampire?
There are other trainers here? This place must get some real attention then.
Other trainers... here? That must be a weird coincidence.
Wow, it's so cool to have a real superhero here. Hey, what are your superpowers?
Hey, we've got adventurers here, right? Can you tell me some stories from your travels? I'd love to hear them.
So who else is also going on adventures? How are yours? Would you mind sharing some of your stories?
Is there something on my face? Why are you ogling me like that?
The way you're looking at me kinda makes me feel uneasy. I don't know exactly why though...
What, you're a real ghost? But how? I mean, there are ghost type Pokémon, but still, we're talking about a human here.
So you're supposed to be famous? Sorry but I'm afraid I've never heard about you. Do you mind telling me something about yourself?
Another opponent enters the stage. Be ready to give it your best, because I'm gonna give it mine.
That sounds like fun. I have a swimsuit on under this anyways.
You and me both, Pyrrha.
I could still probably use a little more sun.
We should get the waitress to join the game. What do you say? Are you in?
What does your boss look like, Nugi-chan? I'll tell you if I see them coming.
Were you hoping for spectators, Pyrrha?
I think this is a salt water habitat. Maybe we could get closer to the water's edge and look to see which water Pokémon we can find.
That... is actually a pretty good question. I guess otherwise the game would be over way too quick.
There doesn't need to be guys here for us to have fun, Misty. We'll have just as much fun as we had exploring the world together.
Why are you worried about there being no guys here, Misty. I'm sure we can just as much fun without them.
So you're part of Team Magma? Have I happened to battle you before?
You look like you're part of Team Magma. I hope you aren't here to cause any trouble.
Oh yeah, we'll just see about that now won't we, Roxie?
Hey, once this is over, how about you join me on a contest and we work out a cool routine, Lux. Can you do something like a rainbow?
Demacia? Never heard of that place, Lux. What's it like? Do you think I could visit you sometime?
Actually, I hope it doesn't get any hotter after all. It's hot enough right now.
I wasn't kidding about wanting it to be hotter. It's freezing. Who wants to warm up next to my Blaziken with me?
I love the moonlight. It's like a natural spotlight. And all the lights around us create an atmosphere like I've never seen before. This is going to be great!
Look at this outfit! I made it to match my Lopunny.

Heh, I'm always down for a threeway!
... Wait, not like that! I mean a threeway match.
I'm excited to play with you all today. Let's do this!
Whoa! I'll keep it!
A perfect hand! You better all watch out!
May I have ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~?
I'll take ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ new card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, please.
I guess I'll take ~cards.text~ new card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~.
Ugh! Just give me, ~cards~ new card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~! What's with this luck?
It's not over yet! I'll swap out these ~cards~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~!
Um... I guess I'll swap ~cards.ifPlural(these cards|this card)~. Maybe it'll work this time...
You know, maybe, I should just stick to contests...
Get those kissing lips ready! It's time to find out how badly you did.
Alright! Finally!
No problemo!
Oh, how very nice.
This game sure is full of surprises!
I guess I'm just good at this by now.
I did it! I'm better at this game than I thought!
You can't stop me now! This hand is a winner!
It's time to show I'm not just a pretty face!
Pokémon Contests may be about looking pretty, but I'll prove that I can hold my own in a game like this, too!
Phew, I'm safe this round.
Wow, talk about a lucky break!
Even when some Pokémon look like they may be weak, they can summon something that will turn the tide of a battle.
Well at least I'm safe this round...
I'm at least safe for one more round...
Pretty good stuff. I won't lose this time.
Looks like I'll be safe this round.
Yeah! This is what I was hoping for.
Haha, awesome!
Who else is having a great time to~background.time~?
(I think someone likes me!)
Take your time. We're not in any hurry.
I will say this is a bit more relaxing than my Pokémon contests. Being judged in those things can be quite stressful sometimes.
Pokémon sometimes use their incredible strength do their advantage, but I'll be using my luck to my advantage with this hand.
Don't go easy on me. I've got a lot of natural talent.
This is shaping up nicely.
I'm back in the game.
Hey, that's better!
Don't spend all ~background.time~ thinking! Let's keep going!
A good hand? That's a plus! I mean, Plusle! That's a good joke, right?
You don't have a Chansey! I have an egg-ceptionally good hand.
I've got even more than usual riding on this one, but I can achieve my dreams if I'm determined enough!
These cards are alright. Barely.
You can't blame a girl for hoping for better.
Three of my cards should get a bonus for being unique.
I won't go down without fighting.
I'm just not that impressed to see a pair anymore...
I either stay in a little longer or I lose. We'll see what happens.
I may be on the verge of losing this battle, but we'll see what happens this round.
Like a normal battle match up.
This can keep me in the competition.
All I can do is put my best effort in. And here it is.
My luck can be all over the place... but mostly it's good luck.
Who's ready to take on my two cards?
Why would I be worried?
Pokémon contests are skill based, but sometimes good luck is the difference between winning and losing. I could maybe use a little of that right now.
I'm not able to read minds like psychic Pokémon, but I think this will be alright.

Come on, ~player~.
Don't be a Slowpoke.
Let's go.
I may be down, but I'm not out just yet. Hopefully this can make me stay in just a little longer.
Not bad, but I'd want a better matchup at this stage of the game.
I'm so glad I'm okay. For now, at least.
I can do it. I managed to come this far, didn't I?
I know you like me better with this bracelet on, so I'll keep it just for your sake.
Uh oh. At least Cynthia is a nice, kind, merciful person who would never hurt me, right? Like, I'm not going to get spanked if I lose, am I?
I'm off to a great start.
Can't you give me something better than this?
Is this some kind of trick? I'm on to you, prankster.
This is... concerning.
Even if I take a few hits, I'll still be okay.

What was that advice I was supposed to remember?
... I forgot.
My time in Pokémon contests has come to teach me that people will do whatever it takes to win. I just hope I can pull off a comeback if it comes to it.
Not good...
Yikes! These are worse than I expected...
I'm just now remembering why I've never wanted to play this before...
(Poker face, May! If you just look blank, nobody will know how bad things are.)
We can skip my next turn, right? Pretty please?
(Even if you are going to lose, a smile will hide how bad this seems, right?)
(Pokémon Contests have told me I should smile more often to appeal to the crowd, but I'm sure if there is anything worth smiling about here...)
... Crap.
Oh that's just great.
I should probably stop blurting out how bad my hand is, right? I need all the help I can get.
*gasp*
This is terrible!
This is a disaster!
Ahahaha.. Yeah, I've got nothing.
We're just playing by normal poker rules, right?
*sigh*
Any chance we could just start the whole game over?
I've played poker before. Once.
Looks like I won't be impressing in this contest... or maybe I will be? I guess it depends on how you look at it.
Just like Pokémon battles, you can't win them all, I guess.
This hand isn't very effective.
These cards are like an impassable sandstorm. Hopefully I'll get through this okay.
Crud. These weren't what I was hoping for.
Even a pro loses a few points sometimes, right?
We did shuffle, right?
If you want to get me out of my spats, you could at least buy me a drink first...
Looks like I really am in jeopardy of losing this contest, aren't I? I've lost Pokémon contests before, but this would be a lot different.
I've lost Pokémon contests before, but this would be a lot different of an experience than that.
Why do you have a raunchy photo of your friend with you?!
Yeah I totally get you. Sweets are such a good treat, especially when you can get a bite from one of your friends as well. Hehehe

I wanna be, the very best...
Nope just kidding. I'm usually listening to the latest tunes, however I'm not that much into it.
Um, okay. Wow. So many questions. Can we do that again? I mean, if you want to. Forget I said that. Sorry! I just didn't expect to feel so confused right now!
I'd count them as one accessory. I mean my bracelet also counts as one piece, right?
It's mostly some R&R for me and my Pokémon. The competition season is coming up soon, and we need to be ready.
You're not that unlucky in love are you, Misty? What about that guy who... Oh, right. Forget I mentioned him.
I'm not exactly swimming in romance over here either, Misty...
Maybe we should try double dating, Misty. Not that ~player.ifMale(any guys have|anyone has)~ asked me out recently...
I'm going to become the greatest Pokémon contest master of all time! That's my dream and my Pokémon support me along the way.
You scared me half to death, Sakura! You should've warned us your if head just falls off like that sometimes.
Count me in! I'm sure it will be a lot of fun to do some archeology with one of the worlds most renowned archeologists.
It's possibly the same one, that you already know. Arceus created the universe with Dialga, Palkia and Girantina. Together with the jewel of life, they created earth and all its inhabitants.
Ash Ketchum, safe bet. In all of the adventures he told me about, he has saved the world multiple times. He's a really great friend and a real hero of the Pokémon.
I'm sorry but I suppose I can't tell you much, that you don't already know. You're the famous archeologist, not me.
Well, not to brag, but I did nurse the prince of the seas a few years back. Turns out it's a Manaphy, can you believe that?
There's that one time a few years back when my brother befriended a Jirachi and a few bad guys showed up and we fought something like a nightmare Groudon.
The only raunchy story I know is about 20 years back, when my parents got close. The result of that night can be seen here, hehehe...
The most important recent event for me was when my father became the Professor of the Hoenn region. It set me on the path to become the trainer I am today,
My plans? Basically some relaxing and maybe my Pokémon and I will train some new moves.
Sure, I'm always down for some shopping! Maybe I can find some new outfits that I could wear for some competitions.
I want to be a famous Pokémon contest master. Honestly I think it would be so cool if people would recognize me on the street.
I'd say friendship is a giving and receiving. Like, you're there for someone when they're in need, and if you're in need, they are there for you. Just like me and my Pokémon.
Uh, I really don't need to know this...
Uh, sorry, Wikipe-tan. I think I left my purse in my other bag.
Oh yeah! I've seen those on his bookshelf before! He wrote most of them before I was born though. These days he mostly is doing research out in the field.
I've seen those books on his bookshelf before. He hasn't written since before I was born though. Most days he is out in the field, studying something.
Well, you would think they would want power in a fighting tournament of all things! Just searching for names doesn't seem like the best idea.
Seriously, they gave your Lucario a spot and my Blaziken is not getting one?! That's a scandal! My Blaziken kicks butt, I tell you.
I didn't even know about those rumors. I guess that would make sense though, since you're always traveling.
Yes, Professor Birch is my father. Have you two met before?
You would be correct that Professor Birch is my father, Cynthia. Have you two met before?
No! That's not what I meant at all. I was trying to say that would be the type of thing someone would make up to discredit your business trips!
O-Oh! It was mostly a joke but thank you, Aster! Maybe I can come up with some other reward, hehe.
I can't believe it, two Mistys in the same place! Now that's what I'd call a coincidence.
Honestly, is that all you can think about in your situation? I can understand your intentions, but maybe the timing is a bit off...
If you're at it, you can have my number, too. So you can... you know... call sometime...
What kind of tool do you use for translating your voice? It might be helpful on my travels.
You're so good at singing. I can see you becoming a professional singer in the future.
Wow, you sure have a beautiful voice, Amy. Have you considered becoming a professional musician? Or try grab a guitar or so and make a solo artist.
I can't say that I have a favorite holiday. Depending on where you are, the holidays change, and that's what I like most of them. And the ones where you can get some food, hehehe...
"A Rotom got into my alarm clock and reset it, that's why I'm late", is one of my favorites, hehehe...
Can you teach my Glaceon that move? It looks really useful for protection.
It's not like that block of ice is going to protect you from what's going to happen.
Not to brag, but I'm pretty good at making snacks and Pokéblocks, a snack especially for Pokémon.
You're being a bit quiet, Tomoko! I wonder what you're thinking about!
I did meet the ruler of the seas once. I helped him get back to his palace and save the crown of the ocean.
Who the hell starts a conversation like that?! No, of course I haven't killed anyone! Although I've probably blown up some Team Rocket goons a couple of times. But they never died!
So when you're really a goddess, then you should surely know Arceus, Creator of the universe, right?
A cook-off and a Pokémon competition. You'd lose both of them pretty sure, hehehe...
Oh? Do you happen to travel a lot? You surely have somewhere you call home, right?
I suppose sometime in the future. It's quite early for me to become a parent, after all...
A good friend told me about this place, and well, here I am, hehehe...
I suppose it would be waking up and all my Pokémon being gone. I've spend so much time with them, that they're a part of the family. Loosing them might be the worst for me.
A friend of mine told me about this place, so I'm checking it out, since it sounded kinda cool.
In fact I brought some, but well, they're all in my bag over there so I guess we can have them afterward, maybe?
I guess I can be quite a handful if someone tries to take my food. I mean, I love food and hey, you've got yours and I've got mine, right? So no need to take any from good, old me, right?
Well, I almost drowned inside the Temple of the Sea one time, but was saved by my friends in the end.
You sure can dance! I could watch you for hours!
I can't say I have that many scars, at least not physically. There have been times, when it was rough, but my friends were always there for me.
I wonder why he told you that. At least I can't see a scar on your butt. I mean, not that I was looking...
O-Oh! The only food I've got is for Pokémon... I'm pretty sure humans can't eat it. I think?!
I haven't killed it, but I helped taking down a Groudon. Or an evil ghost Groudon, to be precise.
I'd love to visit your forest, Lyralei. It's always awesome to find some new plants or animals out in the wild.
(I think I may have battled her at some point, because she looks quite worried that I'll challenge her again.)
(She seems quite worried by me... have we crossed paths before? Maybe while I was fighting Maxie?)
Well, they are just Pokémon contests. Each Pokémon is judged on a certain talent, depending on the type of contest.
Oh, I suppose you are talking about a Noctowl then? They like to be out on the dark most of the time.
But don't you like spending time with people, Miko? I have my own Secret Base, but I don't usually spend very much time there.
Yeah, this place is much different then Hoenn... It's definitely a lot more busy.
Which do you like better? Misty's good side... or her backside? It's hard to keep up with an athlete.
You remind me a bit of a Shroomish, ~tomoko~! Grumpy yet oddly adorable!
That outfit is adorable, ~adrien~! If you had it in pink, you'd look just like a little Skitty!
I don't really bother with video games, myself. I'm just too busy raising my Pokémon!
You talk a lot Wheatley! I mean, I talk a lot too but not nearly as much as you!
Heh. You and Chell make a funny team! You do a great double act, even if it's not intentional!
Hey, Chell! Seems pretty unfair that you're doing all the stripping and Wheatley is just sitting there watching, huh?
Hm... I'm not quite sure I understand all this alternate dimension stuff. Does that mean there's a world where I won the Kanto Grand Festival?
Hey! If you can jump in and out of places, can you go fetch us all some snacks? Pleaaaaaaaase!
Is this what you normally wear out, ~scanty~? It's not covering much...
This place looks expensive. How much does it cost to get a good meal here?
It's kind of classy in here. That's perfect for a sophisticated woman like myself.
I think I found a creaky floorboard. It makes a weird noise whenever I move my foot.
How do I look in the moonlight? Even cuter, wouldn't you say?
This place is beautiful! I've never seen anywhere like it!
This isn't how I like to wow the crowd...
Does anyone know what kind of drinks you can order here?
This place here reminds me of my travels in the Alola region. You should definitely visit it sometime.
Do you also feel like your being watched by someone? I can't get this feeling off somehow.
At least it's warm here, so taking off some clothes is not so much of a deal.
I like the classy style of this place, ~player~. Do you come here often?
It's nice being here, however i don't think that I'm made for an office job. Being a Pokémon competitor is way more fun.
Oh my god! You're name's Ash?! What a coincidence, one of my best friends is also named Ash.
Honestly, it's a bit embarrassing for me to play a round of strip poker with someone, who has the same name as one of my best friends.
I'm wondering, even though you share his name, are you a better cook than the Brock I know?
Seriously, did I miss something or is Brock such a popular name? You're the second Brock, that I've met...
Ok, now things good weird really fast. My Dad's also named Norman, so this game is a bit difficult for me...
Good that I have no Daddy issue, or this game now would be weird, as my father's also called Norman.
Hey, you've got the same name as my little brother! Coincidences sure happen, hehehe...
Would you believe it if I told you that one of my best friends is also called Misty?
For real, your name's Dawn?! One of my friends also has that name!
I hope you're all wearing sunscreen.

So it's come to this...
Maybe the loser could just give the winner a little kiss instead? Is it too late to change the rules?
How can someone not wear any underwear? Seriously, what's wrong with you?
Maybe next time, make a note before going to bed, that says "don't forget your underwear!"...

Ah... this is it!
Moment of truth...
(Yep, he's a boy. Couldn't wait to get his thing out.)
(His penis is kind of just flopping there. Oh no. Did he catch me staring?)
What are you thinking about, ~male~?
(Did ~male~ just look at me... and get even harder?!)
I'm not really a huge fan of leotards, as they basically show off every curve you have.
I love capes! I don't know why though, but if I'd be a superhero, I'd definitely have a cape!
Now I'm ready, and I'm going to beat you!
Isn't it kinda impractical to wear a bodysuit? I mean, you have to take almost everything off just to go to the toilet.
I'm not really a fan of bodysuits. You're sweating underneath and they're a pain in the ass when it's getting hot.
I hate high heels! They're so impractical to wear. That's why I prefer boots.
Honestly, isn't armor mostly unpractical? It limits your movement and usually don't look very good...
Why are you even wearing your armor here? It's not like you'll be attacked here by someone.
I love your spats, ~spats~! Aren't they just so comfortable to wear?
You know, ~single~... I'm a bit of a romantic guru. If you need relationship advice, come to me!
You know, this place looks pretty much the same as Lumiose City. Does it also have a gym in the, what was it called? Eiffel Tower?
I could spend hours looking at the scenery. How the lights and the moon align, it just looks so beautiful.
Wow, what a giant cathedral they have here. The only thing I've seen that's comparable is the dome in Hearthome City, and that one is way smaller than this.
I'm definitely gonna take some days off after this and explore the city. There just seems to be so much to look at.
This place sets such a romantic atmosphere with all those rose petals lying around. You really chose a great place, ~player~.
Even though it's the middle of the night, it's at least not that cold. Playing this on a cold night would put the difficulty way up.
This is what I like so much about exploring. You end up in a beautiful city with beautiful scenery and your having a lot of fun playing games with new friends you meet there.

The river in the back makes this place really relaxing for me. I grew up in a region with a lot of water around me. Too bad it's the middle of the night, or I'd ask you all if you wanted to take a swim with me.
I sure would love to have dinner with such romantic scenery. I mean, when the surroundings look so astonishing, then the food has to be delicious, right?
Is it lunchtime yet?
So, do you all live around here?
Can someone pass me my bag? All my snacks are in there.
So I shave! Big deal! That's better anyway, right? Right?
Couldn't we be playing this at the table behind us? You know, for privacy?
Can these lights be dimmed any lower?
Who wants to see me in a swimsuit? I have some really cute ones you'd love.
You all sure dress differently. Do any of you subscribe to the Hoenn fashion magazines?
If you're going to make me stand on the ~background.surface~ for much longer, I'm going to need a foot massage after we're done.
So who here has a favorite Pokémon? Lopunny is so cute. I love its long, fluffy ears.
Should I dance for you, or would that be too distracting?
You ever been to the girls' changing room at the Wallace Cup? This is kinda what it looks like.
I actually passed up an invitation to a pretty big Contest to play to~background.time~. Did I make the right call?
Anybunny else feel like chewing on the greenery?
This place could be like my natural habitat.
Who wants to see me hop over that hedge?
Ah! *gulp* S-So what did you have planned for me, Cynthia? It's not painful, is it?
That's what I was hoping for, Cynthia! But now the attention is for all the wrong reasons.
Uh, not exactly. They're Pokémon Contests. But Beauty is one of the categories, I guess.
Yeah! I knew contests were for me as soon as I saw one.
I am a Pokémon trainer, Cynthia! Me and my Blaziken are unstoppable together!
I have to admit that I was a little worried how everyone would react, but they were really nice about it. Just surprised, I guess!
There's actually a lot of overlap between training and coordinating, so it's not so bad. And I'm a better at being a Coordinator than I am at playing poker!
Hmmm, it's hard to teach elegance. Some of us are just gifted naturally. But if you practice again and again, eventually you'll know your moves so well that you'll have no hesitation.
Haha, are you asking if we get just as many hotheads in contests as we do in battles, Cynthia?
It depends on how long I have. I've met so many people and Pokémon on my travels, and I love to catch up with them when I can! Oh... it's my turn?
Ah, t-that's... I don't have to answer that, do I? But no. Not really. Not like that.
Yeah, sorry! These really don't leave anything to the imagination, do they? And if you don't get a pair in your size, they'll split the first time you bend over.
I really got lucky being put on a table with such amazing people, didn't I?
Don't I get points for style? No? Well, it was worth a try!
I'm glad my Pokémon can't see me right now. It's hard to explain a game like this to them!
What makes me a good Pokémon coordinator is that I know how to lose gracefully. ... Wait, it's me again?! Dammit!
It used to be just bug Pokémon that scared my pants off. If I can make friends with them, I can do anything!
This is just a friendly game, right? I don't need to be too competitive.
Anyone want to go out for something to eat? I'm starving. You hungry, Cynthia? We could take ~player~, all get to know each other a bit better, and come back later to~background.time~?
Ugh. Defeated. If you ~player.ifMale(guys|girls)~ want me to do this, it'd help me a lot if you supported me right now. Like a crowd cheering from the stands, you know?
They can be pretty common here, Meia. If you know where to look, you can find many different types of them!
Well you can collect Pokémon, but the relationships you form with them means so much more then just any dog or cat. They're my companions and friends too!
I didn't ride my bike here, but it is true that I do ride my bike quite often. It's the fastest way to get around the rugged terrain of Hoenn.
I didn't ride it here, but you are right in thinking that I have a bike, Nami. It's the best way to get around the uneven terrain in Hoenn.
I've been to all kinds of places, Nami! The most dangerous places were probably the Aqua and Magma hideouts... Oh! Mt. Chimney too! Battling there was intense because of the heat.
Hey! I may look young, but I'm quite the experienced trainer. I've been training for quite a while, and while being out on my own was hard at first, I eventually got used to it.
I had my Blaziken with me, but on my way in, I was told I couldn't have him on the premises because he is a fire hazard. Ehehe...
My favorite Pokémon is my Blaziken! It's been with me since I was a kid. We work together really well.
Your sister was a "ho"? I'm not quite sure what you mean... but Hoenn is an island region, not whatever you're thinking it is.
Oh, really? What are your creatures like? Pokémon can be very different from each other, so you might have some of your own there.
You're going to give me a lot of chances to show off my cute outfit, aren't you?
If I wiggle my ears for you, will you let me keep them?
You got me! This little bunny can't escape now.
Oops. Sorry, I was paying too much attention to what everyone is wearing.
If I'm going to lose, I'm going to lose in style.
I wouldn't be here if I wasn't willing to get my feet wet.
Oops.
Can I have your attention?
This kind of outfit is called a "badlah". I wore it to the Wallace Cup once.
Maybe I should've been shaking my hips to keep your mind off the game.
I know when I'm beat. To the winner go the spoils...
Ah!
I guess I'll take off my bag. Phooey.
Welp, I guess I got off on a bad start. But don't count me out yet!
Ah man! I'm the first one to expose myself like this? This game is not going in my favor at all!
The stage is mine.
I guess you don't usually win a contest without losing a few rounds!
Now we're getting serious!

*heavy breathing*
You can do this, May.
Be strong.
I was trying to avoid this, but if it is what I must do to win then I'll do it.
Just my bracelet will do, right?
Bracelet, time to say goodbye!
Let's start with my bag. Simple.
First up: my bag!
Sneaks it is, then.
Time to let my hair out.
Is it really time to show my tummy?
Oh no... I guess this is it, huh?
I guess my shorts will have to go, then.
Bye-bye, shorts.
Sneaks it is, then.
Ugh. Time to ditch the bandana.
Oh man... I wasn't prepared for this...
I can feel my heart beating out of my chest...
Seriously? Well, then I'll take off my bracelet.
Oh come on! How can I lose again. Well, I suppose it's time to say goodby to my shorts.
Again? I'll take off my sneaks.
This was the most I thought I'd take off going into this... Not good.
Is it too late to call it quits?
D-do I really have to show it all?
I'm not scared! To be honest, I always wondered what kind of attention I'd get at a nudist beach... Not that I thought I'd ever get close to finding out.

Like, you want me to say it in front of everyone?! With details? That... that might be a bit much. But... um... what if I only tell you if I have to do the forfeit? I think it'd be easier to do in that headspace, y'know?
It's kinda like singing, but instead of showing off your voice, you show off yourself and your Pokémon!
